content:
IEventProcessorFactory IEventProcessorFactory Interface

In this Article

Edit

An interface that provides a factory for creating instances of IEventProcessor.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IEventProcessorFactoryPublic Interface IEventProcessorFactory

Remarks

Use a factory if you need a more advance way to create IEventProcessor. Otherwise you can use EventHubConsumerGroup.RegisterProcessor to specify just the event processor type.

Methods summary

CreateEventProcessor(PartitionContext)
CreateEventProcessor(PartitionContext)

Creates a new instance of an event processor in the specified partition.

Methods

  • Edit
    CreateEventProcessor(PartitionContext)
    CreateEventProcessor(PartitionContext)

    Creates a new instance of an event processor in the specified partition.

    IEventProcessor CreateEventProcessor(PartitionContext context)Function CreateEventProcessor(context As PartitionContext) As IEventProcessor

    Parameters

    • context
      PartitionContext
      PartitionContext

      Partition context information.

    Returns

    • IEventProcessor
      IEventProcessor

      An instance of IEventProcessorFactory.

Details

Namespace

Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging

Assembly

Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll
